typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	adf_run_id as string ('')
}
source(output(
		delay_code as short,
		delay_code_name as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as short,
		flight_id as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> BlobStorage
RenameColumns derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentDate(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $adf_run_id) ~> AddADFDetails
BlobStorage select(mapColumn(
		DLAY_CD = delay_code,
		DLAY_CD_NAME = delay_code_name,
		DLAY_TYP = delay_type,
		DURTN_MNT = duration_mins,
		FLT_ID = flight_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
AddADFDetails sink(input(
		AIR_CRAFT_CPTY as integer,
		ANCLRY_TMPLT_ID as string,
		ARRVL_GT as string,
		ARRVL_TRMNL as string,
		BTCH_CREW_MBR_MASK as string,
		BTCH_PSNGR_MASK as string,
		BRDNG_TIME as string,
		BKD_PSNGR_CNT as integer,
		CNCLD_BY as string,
		CNCLD_RSN as string,
		CARR_CD as double,
		CREW_FLT_POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		CREW_FLT_PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DPTR_GT as string,
		DPTR_TRMNL as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_CITY as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_CNTRY_CD as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_NAME as string,
		DEST_IATA as string,
		DEST_ICAO as string,
		ENABL_BRDNG as boolean,
		ENABL_CREW_APIS as boolean,
		ENABL_DCS as boolean,
		ENABL_PSNGR_APIS as boolean,
		ENABL_THRU_CHK_IN as boolean,
		ESTD_ARRVL_TIME as string,
		ESTD_DPTR_TIME as string,
		EXTRNL_ID as integer,
		FLT_DLAY as string,
		FLT_NO as integer,
		HAS_PSNGR_SCRTY_TRNS as boolean,
		HLTH_CHK_RULES_ID as string,
		PSNGRS as string,
		PAX_BTCH_PRE_VET_STS as string,
		FLT_ID as string,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_OPEN_STNG as boolean,
		IS_PRGRSV_FLT as boolean,
		MKTG_CARR_CD as string,
		MSG as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_CITY as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_CNTRY_CD as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_NAME as string,
		ORIG_IATA as string,
		ORIG_ICAO as string,
		PSNGR_APP_RCPNT_ID as string,
		PAX_FLT_POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		PAX_FLT_PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		PNL_IMPRTD as boolean,
		POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_CREW_MBR_MASK as string,
		POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_PSNGR_MASK as string,
		PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_CREW_MBR_MASK as string,
		PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_PSNGR_MASK as string,
		REMNG_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_TIME as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_TIME as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_TIME_UTC as timestamp,
		SEG_NO as integer,
		STS as string,
		TAIL_NO as string,
		TOT_CRGO_LOAD as boolean,
		TOT_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		TYPE as string,
		UPLIFT_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		USE_AVG_BAG_WGT as boolean,
		USE_AVG_PAX_WGT as boolean,

	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteToSQL
